author: William Shanahan
text: We, City of Augusta, GA, have had a request to create a Citizen Advisory Group for our Transpotation Department and I was wondering if anyone out there have a group/committee already created.  Would love to know the duties and responsibilities of this group.  Any information you can forward would be appreciated.  Thanks,  Bill Shanahan, City of Augusta, Need this information as soon as possible.
title: Citizen Transpotation Groups/Committee
